title: The Vestibule of Hell
data:
***Version [0.25](/0.25 "0.25")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

|   |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
| - | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | The Vestibule of Hell is guarded by Geryon, along with various denizens of each of the hells themselves.Portals to the Vestibule of Hell are found abundantly in the Depths.This branch contains the entrances to the Iron City of Dis, Gehenna, Cocytus and Tartarus. |

|   |                                          |
| - | ---------------------------------------- |
|   | Welcome to Hell! Please enjoy your stay. |

[![Hell entry.png](/images/4/46/Hell_entry.png)](/File:Hell_entry.png) **The Vestibule of Hell** is the entrance to the four other branches of [Hell](/Hell "Hell"). It is presided over by [Geryon](/Geryon "Geryon"), the gatekeeper of Hell.

## Contents

- [1 Useful Info](#Useful_Info)
- [2 Strategy](#Strategy)
- [3 Monsters](#Monsters)
  - [3.1 Uniques](#Uniques)
- [4 History](#History)

## Useful Info

You'll find multiple portals to the Vestibule in [the Depths](/The_Depths "The Depths"). Its most noteworthy inhabitant is [Geryon](/Geryon "Geryon"), a huge three-headed demon, but you'll also find flocks of demons and [hell knights](/Hell_knight "Hell knight"). These monsters guard the entrances to the four main branches of Hell:

- [![Cocytus entry.png](/images/4/43/Cocytus_entry.png)](/File:Cocytus_entry.png) [Cocytus](/Cocytus "Cocytus"), the frozen hell.
- [![Dis entry.png](/images/7/7e/Dis_entry.png)](/File:Dis_entry.png) [The Iron City of Dis](/The_Iron_City_of_Dis "The Iron City of Dis"), the metallic hell.
- [![Gehenna entry.png](/images/c/c1/Gehenna_entry.png)](/File:Gehenna_entry.png) [Gehenna](/Gehenna "Gehenna"), the fiery hell.
- [![Tartarus entry.png](/images/e/e8/Tartarus_entry.png)](/File:Tartarus_entry.png) [Tartarus](/Tartarus "Tartarus"), the deathly hell.

Each of these four branches contains a [rune of Zot](/Rune_of_Zot "Rune of Zot").

## Strategy

By the time your character is ready for [the Depths](/The_Depths "The Depths"), chances are that they can clear the Vestibule, too. Even if you don't plan on doing the rest of the extended game, the [horn of Geryon](/Horn_of_Geryon "Horn of Geryon") can be useful to [Evocations](/Evocations "Evocations") specialists.

Geryon himself is not too difficult to kill. It is Geryon with the rest of the Vestibule that's difficult to kill.

- Most [walls](/Wall "Wall") within the Vestibule are made of rock. If you have a [wand of digging](/Wand_of_digging "Wand of digging"), you can make a [killhole](/Killhole "Killhole") and fight most of the enemies there.

* Geryon himself will never follow you outside of hell. You *can* bring other monsters up. However, [stair dancing](/Stair_dancing "Stair dancing") can be dangerous; Geryon can summon [hell beasts](/Hell_beast "Hell beast"), which can [trample](/Trample "Trample") you off stairs. Monsters with [constriction](/Constriction "Constriction") attacks, such as [tentacled monstrosities](/Tentacled_monstrosities "Tentacled monstrosities") or [anaconda](/Anaconda "Anaconda") [skeletons](/Skeleton_\(monster\) "Skeleton (monster)"), can prevent you from using the stairs too.

- A second unique monster, [Murray](/Murray "Murray") the [curse skull](/Curse_skull "Curse skull"), appears in 25% of games while exploring the Vestibule. He can rapidly reduce you to very low HP if you lack [torment](/Torment "Torment") resistance, and summons hordes of undead to bury you with. Don't be afraid to use a [scroll of blinking](/Scroll_of_blinking "Scroll of blinking") to get away from him the moment you see him, as he can be hard to run from for normal-speed characters.

## Monsters

**Common**

|                                                                                                                                                           |                                                                                                         |                                                                                                                           |
| --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| 4 [![Ice devil.png](/images/b/b5/Ice_devil.png)](/File:Ice_devil.png) **[Ice devil](/Ice_devil "Ice devil")**                                             | 2 [![Reaper.png](/images/6/6a/Reaper.png)](/File:Reaper.png) **[Reaper](/Reaper "Reaper")**             | 3 [![Soul eater.png](/images/8/88/Soul_eater.png)](/File:Soul_eater.png) **[Soul eater](/Soul_eater "Soul eater")**       |
| 3 [![Sun demon.png](/images/f/f0/Sun_demon.png)](/File:Sun_demon.png) **[Sun demon](/Sun_demon "Sun demon")**                                             | h [![Hell hog.png](/images/b/be/Hell_hog.png)](/File:Hell_hog.png) **[Hell hog](/Hell_hog "Hell hog")** | p [![Hell knight.png](/images/4/4c/Hell_knight.png)](/File:Hell_knight.png) **[Hell knight](/Hell_knight "Hell knight")** |
| p [![Necromancer.png](/images/5/5d/Necromancer.png)](/File:Necromancer.png) **[Necromancer (monster)](/Necromancer_\(monster\) "Necromancer (monster)")** |                                                                                                         |                                                                                                                           |

**Uncommon**

|                                                                                                                                                   |                                                                                                                     |                                                                                                                     |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| s [![Demonic crawler.png](/images/0/01/Demonic_crawler.png)](/File:Demonic_crawler.png) **[Demonic crawler](/Demonic_crawler "Demonic crawler")** | h [![Hell hound.png](/images/b/bc/Hell_hound.png)](/File:Hell_hound.png) **[Hell hound](/Hell_hound "Hell hound")** | 4 [![Rust devil.png](/images/1/18/Rust_devil.png)](/File:Rust_devil.png) **[Rust devil](/Rust_devil "Rust devil")** |
| 2 [![Lorocyproca.png](/images/c/c0/Lorocyproca.png)](/File:Lorocyproca.png) **[Lorocyproca](/Lorocyproca "Lorocyproca")**                         | r [![Hell rat.png](/images/6/63/Hell_rat.png)](/File:Hell_rat.png) **[Hell rat](/Hell_rat "Hell rat")**             | 4 [![Red devil.png](/images/d/db/Red_devil.png)](/File:Red_devil.png) **[Red devil](/Red_devil "Red devil")**       |

**Rare**

|                                                                                                               |                                                                                                                                             |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| 2 [![Balrug.png](/images/2/21/Balrug.png)](/File:Balrug.png) **[Balrug](/Balrug "Balrug")**                   | 2 [![Blizzard demon.png](/images/2/25/Blizzard_demon.png)](/File:Blizzard_demon.png) **[Blizzard demon](/Blizzard_demon "Blizzard demon")** |
| 2 [![Cacodemon.png](/images/5/58/Cacodemon.png)](/File:Cacodemon.png) **[Cacodemon](/Cacodemon "Cacodemon")** | 2 [![Green death.png](/images/4/40/Green_death.png)](/File:Green_death.png) **[Green death](/Green_death "Green death")**                   |

**Very Rare**

|                                                                                                                                                                                       |                                                                                                               |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Y [![Hellephant.png](/images/6/66/Hellephant.png)](/File:Hellephant.png) **[Hellephant](/Hellephant "Hellephant")**                                                                   | 2 [![Hellion.png](/images/c/cf/Hellion.png)](/File:Hellion.png) **[Hellion](/Hellion "Hellion")**             |
| X [![Tentacled monstrosity.png](/images/3/37/Tentacled_monstrosity.png)](/File:Tentacled_monstrosity.png) **[Tentacled monstrosity](/Tentacled_monstrosity "Tentacled monstrosity")** | 2 [![Tormentor.png](/images/3/3d/Tormentor.png)](/File:Tormentor.png) **[Tormentor](/Tormentor "Tormentor")** |

Additionally, the entrances to Hell branches are guarded by monsters from these Hells:

- Cocytus: [ice statues](/Ice_statue "Ice statue"), [water elementals](/Water_elemental "Water elemental"), [simulacrums](/Simulacrum_\(monster\) "Simulacrum (monster)"), [skeletons](/Skeleton_\(monster\) "Skeleton (monster)"), and [zombies](/Zombie "Zombie").
- The Iron City of Dis: [iron trolls](/Iron_troll "Iron troll"), [war gargoyles](/War_gargoyle "War gargoyle"), [iron golems](/Iron_golem "Iron golem") and [iron dragons](/Iron_dragon "Iron dragon").
- Gehenna: [fire elementals](/Fire_elemental "Fire elemental"), [molten gargoyles](/Molten_gargoyle "Molten gargoyle").
- Tartarus: [skeletal warriors](/Skeletal_warrior "Skeletal warrior"), [ancient champions](/Ancient_champion "Ancient champion"), [shadow dragons](/Shadow_dragon "Shadow dragon"), [liches](/Lich "Lich"), and [shadow wraiths](/Shadow_wraith "Shadow wraith").

### Uniques

|                                                                                             |                                                                                             |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| & [![Geryon.png](/images/f/f4/Geryon.png)](/File:Geryon.png) **[Geryon](/Geryon "Geryon")** | z [![Murray.png](/images/2/2d/Murray.png)](/File:Murray.png) **[Murray](/Murray "Murray")** |

**Sumoned by Geryon**

- 2 [![Hell beast.png](/images/6/6e/Hell_beast.png)](/File:Hell_beast.png) **[Hell beast](/Hell_beast "Hell beast")**

## History

Prior to [0.14](/0.14 "0.14"), it was necessary to kill [Geryon](/Geryon "Geryon") and sound his [horn](/Horn_of_Geryon "Horn of Geryon") to open up the entrances to the four main branches of Hell, and all portals to the Vestibule were closed when you picked up the Orb.
html:
The Vestibule of Hell

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.25: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.
The Vestibule of Hell is guarded by Geryon, along with various denizens of each of the hells themselves.

Portals to the Vestibule of Hell are found abundantly in the Depths.

This branch contains the entrances to the Iron City of Dis, Gehenna, Cocytus and Tartarus.

Welcome to Hell! Please enjoy your stay.

The Vestibule of Hell is the entrance to the four other branches of Hell. It is presided over by Geryon, the gatekeeper of Hell.

Contents

  • 1 Useful Info
  • 2 Strategy
  • 3 Monsters
    • 3.1 Uniques
  • 4 History

Useful Info

You'll find multiple portals to the Vestibule in the Depths. Its most noteworthy inhabitant is Geryon, a huge three-headed demon, but you'll also find flocks of demons and hell knights. These monsters guard the entrances to the four main branches of Hell:

  • Cocytus, the frozen hell.
  • The Iron City of Dis, the metallic hell.
  • Gehenna, the fiery hell.
  • Tartarus, the deathly hell.

Each of these four branches contains a rune of Zot.

Strategy

By the time your character is ready for the Depths, chances are that they can clear the Vestibule, too. Even if you don't plan on doing the rest of the extended game, the horn of Geryon can be useful to Evocations specialists.

Geryon himself is not too difficult to kill. It is Geryon with the rest of the Vestibule that's difficult to kill.

  • Most walls within the Vestibule are made of rock. If you have a wand of digging, you can make a killhole and fight most of the enemies there.
  • Geryon himself will never follow you outside of hell. You can bring other monsters up. However, stair dancing can be dangerous; Geryon can summon hell beasts, which can trample you off stairs. Monsters with constriction attacks, such as tentacled monstrosities or anaconda skeletons, can prevent you from using the stairs too.
  • A second unique monster, Murray the curse skull, appears in 25% of games while exploring the Vestibule. He can rapidly reduce you to very low HP if you lack torment resistance, and summons hordes of undead to bury you with. Don't be afraid to use a scroll of blinking to get away from him the moment you see him, as he can be hard to run from for normal-speed characters.

Monsters

Common

4 Ice devil 2 Reaper 3 Soul eater
3 Sun demon h Hell hog p Hell knight
p Necromancer (monster)

Uncommon

s Demonic crawler h Hell hound 4 Rust devil
2 Lorocyproca r Hell rat 4 Red devil

Rare

2 Balrug 2 Blizzard demon
2 Cacodemon 2 Green death

Very Rare

Y Hellephant 2 Hellion
X Tentacled monstrosity 2 Tormentor

Additionally, the entrances to Hell branches are guarded by monsters from these Hells:

  • Cocytus: ice statues, water elementals, simulacrums, skeletons, and zombies.
  • The Iron City of Dis: iron trolls, war gargoyles, iron golems and iron dragons.
  • Gehenna: fire elementals, molten gargoyles.
  • Tartarus: skeletal warriors, ancient champions, shadow dragons, liches, and shadow wraiths.

Uniques

& Geryon z Murray

Sumoned by Geryon

  • 2 Hell beast

History

Prior to 0.14, it was necessary to kill Geryon and sound his horn to open up the entrances to the four main branches of Hell, and all portals to the Vestibule were closed when you picked up the Orb.
